abstract: Israeli official confirms Cpl Francisco Javier Soria Toledo, Spanish member of United Nations peacekeeping force, died by Israeli military fire during January Hezbollah attack at Lebanese border.
lead_paragraph: A military investigation concluded that the peacekeeper had been killed as the Israeli military responded to an attack against its forces by Hezbollah.

headline.main: Israeli Fire Killed Spanish Peacekeeper in January, Israeli Official Confirms
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Israel: U.N. Peacekeeper Was Killed by Israeli Forces, Investigation Confirms

snippet: A military investigation concluded that the peacekeeper had been killed as the Israeli military responded to an attack against its forces by Hezbollah.
